sentences.en: The past has a visage, superstition, and a mask, hypocrisy.
sentences.cn: 古有副真面目，那就是迷信，也有套假面具，那就是虚伪。

sentences.en: It was the visage of a demon who has just found his damned soul.
sentences.cn: 这是一副找到了冤家的魔鬼面孔。

sentences.en: Close your eyes and try to recreate his or her visage in your mind.
sentences.cn: 闭上眼睛，试着在脑海里描绘出他的模样。
